item.title: SP Group WALA: Insights on digital transformation and partnership in energy sector
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’ve always wanted to visit SP Group, one of our partners, but the pandemic made it impossible until now. This year, the opportunity finally came when we decided to attend Echelon X in Singapore.
